Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds a single Book and provides comparison methods for each field.
    Author:
    T.Sergeant
    See Also:

    There is a series of searchBy methods that will search the appropriate field. These will be executed by separate threads. Communication with the threads is handled by a shared instance of the SearchRequest class.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Book(java.lang.String bookString)
      Given book info separated by vertical bars (|), splits values and creates a new Book.
      Book(java.lang.String[] bookInfo)
      Stores the array of strings into individual fields of the new object.
      Book(java.lang.String isbn, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author, int numPages, int year)
      Creates a new Book given individual components.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns true if val is found in the author field.

      Returns true if val is found in the isbn field.

      Returns true if num matches the numPages field.

      Returns true if val is found in the year field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String bookString)
        Given book info separated by vertical bars (|), splits values and creates a new Book.
        Parameters:
        bookString - book information in this form: isbn|title|author|numPages|year
        See Also:
        BookDatabase

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String[] bookInfo)
        Stores the array of strings into individual fields of the new object.
        Parameters:
        bookInfo - an array containing info about a specific book the search as well as what value is to be searched for

        The positions are specific to the format of the data file and use of the split method found in the BookDatabase class.

        See Also:
        BookDatabase

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String isbn,
    java.lang.String title,
    java.lang.String author,
    int numPages,
    int year)
        Creates a new Book given individual components.
        Parameters:
        isbn - the ISBN of the new book
        title - the title of the new book
        author - the author of the new book
        numPages - the number of pages in the new book
        year - the year of publication of the new book
